text: We will hear arguments next in 76-906 United Air Lines against McMann.
Mr. Chief Justice may it please the court.
Mr. Chief Justice and may it please the court.
Do you distinguish between the purposes of the Act and language of the Act in any way?
No I think the language of the Act is clear Section 4(f)(2) incorporates by reference basically, the provisions of Section 2 which state the purposes.
Do you accept the Fourth Circuit's characterization of the plan as being a bona fide plan?
The question down there was presented to me, and I said I agreed with them that it was bona fide in the sense that it does pay substantial benefits.
